title: Looking for E Ten or E Seventeen
content:
Hello,   
   
I'm trying to buy a license for fonts called "E Ten" and "E Seventeen". Does anyone have information on how I can find this font?   
   
Thanks,   
   
Kristin
author: kristin

comments.content:
Yves, I have a sample, so I've posted this question to the Type Identification board.   
   
Thanks,   
   
Kristin
